subproject.corporate outcome: Electoral laws, processes and institutions strengthen inclusive participation and professional electoral administration
subproject.description:
This project seeks to increase the awareness of women and youth in the informal sector on their civic and political rights under multiparty dispensation in five districts of Uganda. The specific project objectives include;
1.To increase knowledge of the women and youth in informal sector on multiparty system and relevant laws.
2.Increase awareness of the informal sector women and youth of their civic and political rights and participation in multiparty political activities at the local level.
3.Increase the number of women and youth in the formal sector’s taking up leadership positions in political party structures and active participation in nascent multiparty democracy.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Civic &Political Participation

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national, regional and local level capacity to mainstream gender equality and women’s empowerment in government policies and institutions
